description: Scopri i migliori hotel a Lombok, Indonesia. Trova offerte esclusive e alloggi di lusso.

hotels.title: Luxury Lombok Villa Hideaway with Onsite Restaurant & Spa
hotels.description: Discover a luxury hideaway in Lombok, featuring bespoke villas with private plunge pools overlooking a pristine bay. This intimate sanctuary, set against the backdrop of a world-class surf beach and framed by lush palm trees, offers the perfect tranquil escape. Immerse yourself in nature’s beauty as you hit the waves or simply relax poolside, taking in stunning valley and sea views. Enjoy locally sourced international fusion cuisine, sip on a refreshing cocktail and embrace tranquillity with ample opportunities for mindfulness and relaxation. End your day watching the sky ignite with the colours of a breathtaking sunset.

hotels.title: Refined Lombok Cliffside Private Pool Studios & Villas for up to 15 People
hotels.description: Lombok luxury awaits at the boutique Selong Selo Resort & Residences, breathtakingly positioned upon jungle-clad clifftops with spectacular ocean views. The resort’s eco-friendly studios and villas all showcase Seminyak-inspired beach cool, with artisanal furniture, Indonesian sculpture and private infinity pools that blend seamlessly into the horizon. Embrace euphoria at the spa, walk along the beach, and dine on local specialities at Aura Lounge & Bar.

hotels.title: Lombok Designer All-Suite Escape with Direct Beach Access & Three Dining Venues
hotels.description: The serene tranquillity of Lombok has been reimagined at this designer oceanfront escape. With interiors designed by Roberto Cavalli, including Italian Murano chandeliers and European marble, this five-star, all-suite retreat provides the best of Indonesian opulence. Enjoy anytime dining prepared by top chefs, beachfront cabanas, and discreet butler service. Unwind in your suite’s private jacuzzi, swim in the resort's infinity pool, or explore secluded reefs. As night falls, dine at L’Angelo Bianco or enjoy a cocktail at the Secret Beach Swim-Up Bar, while watching the sunset over the ocean.

hotels.vendor_name: Pullman Lombok Merujani Mandalika Beach Resort
hotels.title: Beachfront Pullman Lombok Escape with Five Bars & Restaurants, Free-Form Pool & Rooftop Terrace
hotels.description: Set your watch to island time with an escape to this beachfront oasis located on Bali's spectacular sister island. Relax on the private beach, slip into the oceanfront pool, pamper yourself with a treatment at the heavenly Pullman Spa, or taste your way around the onsite restaurants. Embrace the island lifestyle, knowing your only care in the world is which activity to pick. Catch the shuttle to nearby Kuta, ascend the towering Mount Rinjani for majestic sunsets, or use this five-star oasis as your launchpad to the Gili Islands, where you can snorkel and scuba dive to your heart's content.

hotels.title: Romantic Lombok Beachfront Escape with Daily Breakfast & Cocktails
hotels.description: Escape to Hotel Tugu Lombok for a serene beachfront break amid the white sands, aquamarine waters and lush palm trees of Bali's sister island. Situated on pristine Sire Beach, this romantic hotel is peppered with Indonesian antiques and artwork, paying homage to the area’s spirit, culture and history. A tranquil base for visitors to Lombok, Hotel Tugu Lombok offers every modern amenity guests could dream of, including an indoor and outdoor pool, complimentary Wi-Fi, BBQ facilities, spa, library, bicycle rental, hot tub, bar, restaurant and more. It's little wonder this fantastic hotel ranks among the top five out of almost 400 in Lombok on Tripadvisor and is stamped with a Travellers' Choice Award 2020. **Luxury Escapes inclusions (select nights)** - Wake up to **daily à la carte breakfast** at the onsite Kokok Pletok restaurant - Enjoy **daily afternoon tea** served between 4.30pm and 6pm - Sip one **complimentary tropical cocktail per person every day** at the bar - Settle into relaxation with a **15-minute welcome massage per person** - Get things off to a great start with **one welcome cocktail per person** - Relax with a **60-minute massage** at the onsite spa per adult (for stays of 3+ nights) - Savour **one three-course dinner for two** at Kokok Pletok restaurant (for stays of 5+ nights) **Private pool villa upgrade available:** Upgrade to a Bhagavat Gita Beachfront Pool Villa, housed in a beautiful beachfront building with a private plunge pool and direct beach access.

hotels.title: Serene Lombok Beachfront Escape with Daily Breakfast & Cocktails
hotels.description: Find everything you need for a serene escape at Jeeva Klui Resort, a stunning beachfront retreat framed by the natural beauty of Lombok. Perfectly positioned along an uninterrupted stretch of sand, Jeeva Klui Resort embodies the soul of Indonesia through its beautiful blend of local culture, exemplary service and tropical surrounds. Take a dip in the warm surf of the Indian Ocean, gaze into the endless horizon from the infinity pool or relax with a treatment in the luxurious resort spa. Each intimate suite or villa offers a barefoot oasis ensconced in a natural setting. Expect outdoor rain showers, handcrafted design and lush tropical gardens. Onsite dining includes The Waroeng, a celebration of Lombok community and culture, and the breathtaking Pearl's, the perfect spot for ocean-view sunset cocktails. **Luxury Escapes inclusions (select nights)** - Wake up to **daily à la carte breakfast** overlooking the ocean at The Waroeng - Toast to your escape with a **daily cocktail** and sunset views - Unwind with a luxurious one-time **60-minute massage** at Jeevaniya Spa - Enjoy your choice of a **one-time set lunch or dinner** at The Waroeng, where you can indulge in Western, Indonesian or Asian cuisine (for stays of 3+ nights) - Double the indulgence with **two** **set lunches or dinners** at The Waroeng (for stays of 5+ nights) **Looking for added luxury?** Upgrade to an Akasha Pool Villa, featuring your very own private pool. **Travelling as a group?** Select the Duplex Upgrade, which can accommodate up to six guests (extra guest surcharges apply).

hotels.title: Five-Star Lombok Beachfront Bliss with Onsite Spa and Four Bars & Restaurants
hotels.description: Watch purple sunsets paint the sky every night at The Oberoi Beach Resort, Lombok, an exquisite oasis on the pristine shores of Medana Bay. Explore the enchanting waterfalls and lush rainforests of North Lombok, or immerse yourself in the vibrant local culture at the traditional Sasak village. Savour world-class dining at the resort's restaurants, or unwind in the spa. As the sun sets, retreat to your pavilion or villa, offering breathtaking views of the turquoise sea and Mount Rinjani.

hotels.title: Beachfront Lombok Tropical Escape with Private Stretch of Sand, Two Restaurants & Pool
hotels.description: Wander manicured tropical gardens, dive into pristine waters along a private beach and float in the sparkling lagoon pool that snakes through the resort with a luxurious stay at Merumatta Senggigi Lombok. Start each day with spectacular views of the resort's gardens over a delicious breakfast at Rinjani Restaurant, try authentic Italian delicacies at Basilico Restaurant, and later, sip on creative cocktails at Sunset Bar as you watch the sky turn a brilliant shade of orange over the Lombok Strait. When you're not relaxing in your private room or at the tranquil day spa, enjoy a day of adventure with a trip to the nearby Gili Islands.

hotels.title: Secluded Lombok Beachfront Escape with Two Swimming Pools & Beach Bar
hotels.description: Escape to Bali’s pristine sister island, Lombok, for a serene beachfront escape surrounded by powder-white sands, aquamarine waters and swaying palm trees. Perfectly positioned on the island's scenic southern shore, Novotel Lombok Resort & Villas offers an authentic taste of Indonesia with all the comforts of home. Dine on authentic Indonesian fare as you soak up ocean views at beachfront Spice Market Restaurant, take a dip in one of the resort’s two dazzling swimming pools or visit In Balance Spa for a traditional Sasak massage. No matter how you spend your days, this beachfront paradise is your gateway to Lombok living.
